WsdaInfo
WsdaInfo

Holds info on a discovered WSDA.

Functions
WsdaInfo
WsdaInfo(
std::string url,
std::string serial
)

Creates a WsdaInfo object.

Parameters
url
std::string

The 'presentationUrl' from the upnp discovery.

serial
std::string

The 'serial' from the upnp discovery.

Variables
m_url
std::string m_url

The url of the upnp discovery.

m_serial
std::string m_serial

The serial of the upnp discovery.

Functions
ipAddress
std::string ipAddress() const

Gets the IP Address of the WSDA.

port
uint16 port() const

Gets the port number of the WSDA.

name
std::string name() const

Gets the name of the WSDA.
